Container.Name: OrchardCoreCMS
Container.Overview: This app installs Orchard Core CMS official docker image to Unraid. After installing the container, open the WebUI to finalize the setup. Notes: The administrator password has to be complex enough. Otherwise you get error: please enter the required format. When the bar under it turns green it's okay. Some templates hide admin dashboard. Append /Admin to your URL to access it. http://your-address:port/Admin
